name: antelope
description: Antelopes are herbivorous mammals known for their agility and distinctive horns.
advice: Observe antelopes from a safe distance during wildlife viewing.

name: badger
description: Badgers are carnivorous mammals known for their burrowing habits.
advice: Observe badgers from a distance and avoid disturbing their burrows.

name: bat
description: Bats are flying mammals known for their nocturnal behavior and ability to fly.
advice: Observe bats at dusk and night in natural habitats.

name: bear
description: Bears are large carnivorous mammals known for their strength and hibernation.
advice: Avoid encountering wild bears and follow safety guidelines in bear habitats.

name: bee
description: Bees are flying insects known for their role in pollination and honey production.
advice: Observe bees from a distance and avoid disturbing their nests.

name: beetle
description: Beetles are diverse insects known for their hard exoskeleton and varied lifestyles.
advice: Observe beetles in natural habitats and avoid handling them.

name: bison
description: Bisons are large herbivorous mammals known for their strength and social behavior.
advice: Observe bison from a safe distance in their natural habitat.

name: boar
description: Boars are wild pigs known for their tusks and foraging behavior.
advice: Avoid encountering wild boars and keep a safe distance.

name: butterfly
description: Butterflies are colorful insects known for their intricate wing patterns and pollination.
advice: Observe butterflies in natural habitats and avoid handling them.

name: cat
description: Cats are domesticated carnivorous mammals known for their companionship with humans.
advice: Interact with cats responsibly and provide proper care as pets.

name: caterpillar
description: Caterpillars are the larval stage of insects, often known for their distinctive appearance.
advice: Observe caterpillars in natural habitats and avoid handling them.

name: chimpanzee
description: Chimpanzees are highly intelligent primates known for their social behavior and tool use.
advice: Observe chimpanzees from a safe distance and follow guidelines for primate viewing.

name: cockroach
description: Cockroaches are insects known for their adaptability and scavenging behavior.
advice: Manage cockroach infestations in living spaces and avoid handling them.

name: cow
description: Cows are domesticated herbivorous mammals raised for their milk and meat.
advice: Interact with cows on farms and follow guidelines for handling livestock.

name: coyote
description: Coyotes are adaptable carnivorous mammals known for their howling calls.
advice: Observe coyotes from a distance and avoid interactions with wild coyotes.

name: crab
description: Crabs are crustaceans known for their sideways walking and aquatic lifestyles.
advice: Observe crabs in coastal habitats and avoid handling them.

name: crow
description: Crows are intelligent birds known for their problem-solving abilities and cawing calls.
advice: Observe crows in urban and natural habitats and appreciate their behaviors.

name: deer
description: Deers are herbivorous mammals known for their graceful appearance and antlers (in males).
advice: Observe deer from a distance and avoid interactions, especially during mating season.

name: dog
description: Dogs are domesticated mammals known for their loyalty and companionship with humans.
advice: Interact with dogs responsibly, provide proper care as pets, and respect other dog owners.

name: dolphin
description: Dolphins are intelligent marine mammals known for their playful behavior and communication.
advice: Observe dolphins in their natural habitat and respect marine life conservation guidelines.

name: donkey
description: Donkeys are domesticated mammals known for their role as working animals and companions.
advice: Interact with donkeys responsibly and provide proper care as working animals or pets.

name: dragonfly
description: Dragonflies are flying insects known for their large eyes and impressive flying abilities.
advice: Observe dragonflies near freshwater habitats and appreciate their aerial acrobatics.

name: duck
description: Ducks are waterfowl known for their quacking calls and aquatic lifestyles.
advice: Observe ducks in wetland habitats and respect their natural behaviors.

name: eagle
description: Eagles are large birds of prey known for their keen eyesight and powerful talons.
advice: Observe eagles from a distance and appreciate their hunting behaviors.

name: elephant
description: Elephants are large herbivorous mammals known for their intelligence and social behavior.
advice: Observe elephants from a safe distance and support elephant conservation efforts.

name: flamingo
description: Flamingos are wading birds known for their long legs and distinctive pink plumage.
advice: Observe flamingos in wetland habitats and appreciate their unique appearance.

name: fly
description: Flies are insects known for their short lifespan and important role in ecosystems.
advice: Observe flies in various habitats and appreciate their ecological significance.

name: fox
description: Foxes are small to medium-sized carnivorous mammals known for their cunning behavior.
advice: Observe foxes from a distance and avoid feeding or approaching them.

name: goat
description: Goats are domesticated mammals known for their grazing behavior and diverse uses.
advice: Interact with goats on farms and provide proper care as livestock.

name: goldfish
description: Goldfish are freshwater fish known for their bright colors and popularity as aquarium pets.
advice: Keep goldfish responsibly in well-maintained aquariums and avoid releasing them into the wild.

name: goose
description: Geese are waterfowl known for their honking calls and migratory behavior.
advice: Observe geese in wetland habitats and respect their nesting areas.

name: gorilla
description: Gorillas are large primates known for their strength and close-knit social groups.
advice: Observe gorillas in their natural habitat and follow guidelines for primate viewing.

name: grasshopper
description: Grasshoppers are hopping insects known for their role in plant consumption and sound production.
advice: Observe grasshoppers in various habitats and appreciate their ecological role.

name: hamster
description: Hamsters are small rodents known for their cheek pouches and burrowing behavior.
advice: Keep hamsters responsibly as pets and provide appropriate care.

name: hare
description: Hares are fast-running mammals known for their long ears and powerful hind legs.
advice: Observe hares in grasslands and open areas, especially during their active periods.

name: hedgehog
description: Hedgehogs are spiky mammals known for their nocturnal habits and insectivorous diet.
advice: Observe hedgehogs at dusk and night in natural habitats.

name: hippopotamus
description: Hippopotamuses are large semi-aquatic mammals known for their size and territorial behavior.
advice: Observe hippos from a safe distance during wildlife viewing and respect their habitat.

name: hornbill
description: Hornbills are birds known for their unique bills and distinctive vocalizations.
advice: Observe hornbills in their natural habitat and appreciate their behaviors.

name: horse
description: Horses are domesticated mammals known for their role in transportation, sport, and agriculture.
advice: Interact with horses responsibly and provide proper care as livestock or companion animals.

name: hummingbird
description: Hummingbirds are small birds known for their rapid wingbeats and ability to hover.
advice: Observe hummingbirds near flowers and feeders in their natural habitats.

name: hyena
description: Hyenas are carnivorous mammals known for their scavenging behavior and distinctive calls.
advice: Observe hyenas from a distance during wildlife viewing and avoid interactions.

name: jellyfish
description: Jellyfish are aquatic creatures known for their gelatinous bodies and stinging tentacles.
advice: Observe jellyfish in the ocean and avoid touching them to prevent stings.

name: kangaroo
description: Kangaroos are marsupial mammals known for their powerful hind legs and hopping behavior.
advice: Observe kangaroos from a distance in their natural habitat.

name: koala
description: Koalas are marsupial mammals known for their tree-dwelling habits and eucalyptus diet.
advice: Observe koalas in their natural habitat and respect their need for undisturbed trees.

name: ladybugs
description: Ladybugs are small beetles known for their spotted appearance and role in pest control.
advice: Observe ladybugs in gardens and natural habitats and appreciate their ecological role.

name: leopard
description: Leopards are large carnivorous mammals known for their powerful build and distinctive coat.
advice: Observe leopards from a safe distance during wildlife viewing.

name: lion
description: Lions are social big cats known for their majestic appearance and group behavior.
advice: Observe lions from a safe distance during wildlife viewing and respect their habitat.

name: lizard
description: Lizards are reptiles known for their diverse appearances and ability to regenerate lost tails.
advice: Observe lizards in various habitats and avoid disturbing their natural behaviors.

name: lobster
description: Lobsters are marine crustaceans known for their large claws and culinary value.
advice: Observe lobsters in underwater habitats and respect fishing regulations.

name: mosquito
description: Mosquitoes are flying insects known for their role in disease transmission and irritating bites.

name: moth
description: Moths are nocturnal insects known for their diverse appearances and attraction to light.
advice: Observe moths at night in various habitats and appreciate their ecological role.

name: mouse
description: Mice are small rodents known for their rapid reproduction and ability to squeeze through small openings.
advice: Manage mouse infestations in living spaces and keep areas clean.

name: octopus
description: Octopuses are marine animals known for their intelligence and camouflage abilities.
advice: Observe octopuses in underwater habitats and respect marine life conservation guidelines.

name: okapi
description: Okapis are forest-dwelling mammals known for their striped appearance and reclusive behavior.
advice: Observe okapis from a safe distance in their rainforest habitat.

name: orangutan
description: Orangutans are great apes known for their intelligence and tree-dwelling habits.
advice: Observe orangutans from a safe distance and follow guidelines for primate viewing.

name: otter
description: Otters are aquatic mammals known for their playful behavior and streamlined bodies.
advice: Observe otters in aquatic habitats and respect their need for clean water.

name: owl
description: Owls are nocturnal birds of prey known for their silent flight and hunting abilities.
advice: Observe owls at dusk and night and appreciate their hunting behaviors.

name: ox
description: Oxen are domesticated cattle used for plowing and carrying loads.
advice: Interact with oxen responsibly and provide proper care as working animals.

name: oyster
description: Oysters are bivalve mollusks known for their shellfish and filtration abilities.
advice: Harvest oysters sustainably and respect marine ecosystem health.

name: panda
description: Pandas are bears known for their distinctive black and white coat and bamboo diet.
advice: Observe pandas from a safe distance and support panda conservation efforts.

name: parrot
description: Parrots are colorful birds known for their ability to mimic human speech and vibrant plumage.
advice: Observe parrots in their natural habitat and support efforts to combat illegal pet trade.

name: pelecaniformes
description: Pelecaniformes are a group of aquatic birds including pelicans, herons, and ibises.
advice: Observe pelecaniformes in wetland habitats and appreciate their diverse behaviors.

name: penguin
description: Penguins are flightless birds known for their tuxedo-like appearance and swimming abilities.
advice: Observe penguins in their natural habitat and respect their unique adaptations.

name: pig
description: Pigs are domesticated mammals raised for their meat and various products.
advice: Interact with pigs on farms and provide proper care as livestock.

name: pigeon
description: Pigeons are birds known for their urban presence and cooing calls.
advice: Observe pigeons in urban areas and appreciate their interactions.

name: porcupine
description: Porcupines are rodents known for their sharp quills and nocturnal behavior.
advice: Observe porcupines at dusk and night in natural habitats.

name: possum
description: Possums are marsupial mammals known for their prehensile tails and nocturnal habits.
advice: Observe possums at dusk and night in natural habitats.

name: raccoon
description: Raccoons are intelligent mammals known for their masked appearance and adaptability.
advice: Observe raccoons from a distance and avoid feeding them.

name: rat
description: Rats are rodents known for their rapid reproduction and scavenging behavior.
advice: Manage rat infestations in living spaces and keep areas clean.

name: reindeer
description: Reindeer are large herbivorous mammals known for their importance in Arctic cultures.
advice: Observe reindeer from a distance in their Arctic habitat and support indigenous practices.

name: rhinoceros
description: Rhinoceroses (rhinos) are large herbivorous mammals known for their horn and powerful build.
advice: Observe rhinos from a safe distance during wildlife viewing and support conservation efforts.

name: rooster
description: Roosters are male chickens known for their crowing calls and colorful plumage.
advice: Interact with roosters responsibly on farms and respect noise regulations.

name: salamander
description: Salamanders are amphibians known for their slender bodies and habitat diversity.
advice: Observe salamanders in moist habitats and avoid disturbing their habitats.

name: scorpion
description: Scorpions are arachnids known for their venomous stings and nocturnal behavior.
advice: Observe scorpions from a distance and avoid handling them.

name: seagull
description: Seagulls are birds known for their presence near coastlines and scavenging behavior.
advice: Observe seagulls in coastal habitats and avoid feeding them.

name: seahorse
description: Seahorses are marine fish known for their upright posture and unique method of reproduction.
advice: Observe seahorses in underwater habitats and support marine life conservation.

name: seal
description: Seals are marine mammals known for their streamlined bodies and swimming abilities.
advice: Observe seals in coastal habitats and respect marine life conservation guidelines.

name: shark
description: Sharks are cartilaginous fish known for their powerful jaws and role in marine ecosystems.
advice: Observe sharks from a distance and respect marine life conservation efforts.
dangerous: Potentially dangerous (some species are dangerous to humans)

name: sheep
description: Sheep are domesticated mammals known for their wool and meat.
advice: Interact with sheep on farms and provide proper care as livestock.

name: shrimp
description: Shrimp are small crustaceans known for their culinary value and wide distribution.
advice: Harvest shrimp sustainably and respect marine ecosystem health.

name: skunk
description: Skunks are mammals known for their distinctive black and white coloration and defensive spray.
advice: Observe skunks from a distance and avoid startling them.

name: sloth
description: Sloths are arboreal mammals known for their slow movement and unique lifestyle.
advice: Observe sloths from a distance in their rainforest habitat and support conservation efforts.

name: snail
description: Snails are mollusks known for their spiral shells and slow movement.
advice: Observe snails in various habitats and appreciate their unique adaptations.

name: snake
description: Snakes are legless reptiles known for their diverse appearances and hunting methods.
advice: Observe snakes from a safe distance and avoid provoking them.
dangerous: Potentially dangerous (venomous species) or not dangerous (non-venomous species)

name: spider
description: Spiders are arachnids known for their silk production and role in insect control.
advice: Observe spiders in various habitats and appreciate their ecological role.

name: squirrel
description: Squirrels are rodents known for their agility and habit of storing food.
advice: Observe squirrels in various habitats and appreciate their energetic behavior.

name: starfish
description: Starfish are marine echinoderms known for their radial symmetry and ability to regenerate arms.
advice: Observe starfish in underwater habitats and respect marine life conservation guidelines.

name: stork
description: Storks are large wading birds known for their distinctive beaks and nesting behaviors.
advice: Observe storks in wetland habitats and respect their nesting areas.

name: swan
description: Swans are waterfowl known for their graceful appearance and presence in lakes and rivers.
advice: Observe swans in wetland habitats and respect their natural behaviors.

name: tarantula
description: Tarantulas are large spiders known for their size and often hairy appearance.
advice: Observe tarantulas from a safe distance and avoid provoking them.

name: tiger
description: Tigers are large carnivorous mammals known for their strength and distinctive coat.
advice: Observe tigers from a safe distance during wildlife viewing and support conservation efforts.

name: toucan
description: Toucans are birds known for their large and colorful bills.
advice: Observe toucans in their natural habitat and appreciate their unique appearance.

name: turkey
description: Turkeys are birds known for their role as domesticated poultry and wild game.
advice: Interact with turkeys responsibly and support ethical farming practices.
dangerous: Not dangerous (domesticated), potentially dangerous (wild males during mating season)

name: turtle
description: Turtles are reptiles known for their protective shells and aquatic or terrestrial lifestyles.
advice: Observe turtles in various habitats and respect their need for protection.

name: vulture
description: Vultures are scavenging birds of prey known for their bald heads and soaring flights.
advice: Observe vultures in various habitats and appreciate their ecological role.

name: wallaby
description: Wallabies are marsupial mammals similar to kangaroos but smaller in size.
advice: Observe wallabies from a distance in their natural habitat.

name: walrus
description: Walruses are marine mammals known for their tusks and social behaviors.
advice: Observe walruses from a safe distance and respect marine life conservation guidelines.
dangerous: Not dangerous (can be unpredictable and territorial)

name: whale
description: Whales are marine mammals known for their large size and distinctive behaviors.
advice: Observe whales from a safe distance during marine excursions and support marine conservation.

name: wolf
description: Wolves are carnivorous mammals known for their pack structure and howling calls.
advice: Observe wolves from a safe distance during wildlife viewing and support conservation efforts.
dangerous: Potentially dangerous (wild animals with predatory behavior)

name: wombat
description: Wombats are marsupial mammals known for their burrowing habits and sturdy build.
advice: Observe wombats from a distance and avoid disturbing their burrows.

name: woodpecker
description: Woodpeckers are birds known for their drumming behavior on trees and strong beaks.
advice: Observe woodpeckers in various habitats and appreciate their ecological role.

name: yak
description: Yaks are bovine mammals known for their sturdy build and domestication in mountainous regions.
advice: Interact with yaks responsibly and support the traditional cultures of yak herders.

name: zebra
description: Zebras are equine mammals known for their black and white stripes.
advice: Observe zebras from a safe distance during wildlife viewing and support conservation efforts.
